title: visual studio 2022 crashes when loading my solution
body:
_This issue has been moved from [a ticket on Developer Community](https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/t/visual-studio-2022-crashes-when-loading-/10010478)._

---
visual studio 2022 crashes when loading my solution  
when i load visual studio without my solution, (or another solution) it does not crash.

I had this problem before, but it went away when upgrading visual studio 2022.  
I have been working in this solution - VS version just yesterday and everything was fine.  
Now it crashes on open.

Using the latest vs version 17.1.3

the solution loads without crashing in VS 2019
